description: ESLint configuration file that extends Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript configs using @eslint/eslintrc's FlatCompat.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Defines the current file's filename as a URL path.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Defines the current directory path based on __filename.

methods.name: compat
methods.description: An instance of FlatCompat for configuration extension handling.

methods.name: eslintConfig
methods.description: The ESLint configuration array extending Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript configs.
